title: Twisted Gan-Gross-Prasad conjecture for unramified quadratic extensions
abstract: Using a relative trace formula approach, we prove the twisted global Gan-Gross-Prasad conjecture for $\operatorname{U}(V) \subseteq \operatorname{GL}(V)$, as well as its refinement, under some unramifiedness assumptions and local conditions on the quadratic extension and the automorphic representation.
